text: The 9th Politburo, the 9th Secretariat and the 9th Orgburo of the Russian Communist Party (Bolsheviks) were elected by the 1st Plenary Session of the 9th Central Committee, in the immediate aftermath of the 9th Congress. ==9th Politburo== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text- align:center;" border="1" |+Candidate members ! title: 9th Politburo, the 9th Secretariat and the 9th Orgburo of the Russian Communist Party (Bolsheviks)
